      • setCurrentImageByUID

        public abstract boolean setCurrentImageByUID​(java.lang.String imageUID)
        Tries to set the current image to one having the supplied UID. Returns true if the attempt is successful.
        Parameters:
        imageUID - UID of image to set as the current image.
        Returns:
        True if the current image was changed to the one with the supplied UID; false otherwise.

      • setCurrentImageByURI

        public abstract boolean setCurrentImageByURI​(java.lang.String imageURI)
        Tries to set the current image to one having the supplied URI. Returns true if the attempt is successful.
        Parameters:
        imageURI - URI of image to set as the current image.
        Returns:
        True if the current image was changed to the one with the supplied URI; false otherwise.
